arguments.name: Rate
arguments.description: The interest rate for the loan.

arguments.name: Nper
arguments.description: The total number of payments for the loan.

arguments.name: Pv
arguments.description: The present value, or the total amount that a series of future payments is worth now; also known as the principal.

arguments.name: Fv
arguments.description: The future value, or a cash balance you want to attain after the last payment is made. If fv is omitted, it is assumed to be 0 (zero), that is, the future value of a loan is 0.

arguments.name: Type
arguments.description: The number 0 (zero) or 1 and indicates when payments are due.
